Key Match Events: Northern Ireland and Belarus played a 0-0 draw
Post-Match Reflections: Northern Ireland coach Michael O'Neill was satisfied with the 0-0 draw against Belarus, finding positives despite the scoreline
He emphasized that the team is not going to be a high-scoring team at the minute and needs to find ways to win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held in Hungary
Liverpool youngster Conor Bradley was captain for the tie
Others: The team kept a clean sheet and had two clean sheets in three Nations League games
O'Neill finds that with a young team like this, there are learnings from games like this
